column1: Uchi////I may have been the lone holdout in Houston's foodie army to visit Uchi
column2: but coincidentally the week I decided to take the leap turned out to include a visiting Paul Qui! A friend was lucky enough to snag an early reservation so off we went (even taking off work a bit early to make it!). Parking is pretty much just valet behind the building. All the spaces are a little tight
column3: but not uncomfortably so. While waiting on the patio
column4: you can get drinks and snacks. Staff was very welcoming and friendly. Our server was knowledgeable and thoughtful
column5: offering suggestions and explaining the menu options. And here we go!
